name: Urban Birds of Paradise
description:
You're a wildlife photographer... In the middle of the city. You're gonna have to make do. 

Take the best pictures of pigeons you possible can! You get more points for flying pigeons. 

Future versions will have pigeons hop around and interact some more, as well as adding better photo-making-mechanics. This is just a proof-of-concept.

Press [SPACE] to take a picture.

Pigeon sprites taken and edited from: https://opengameart.org/content/pigeon-blue-bird-rework

Background sprites taken from: https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-art-street-backgrounds
